name: SUPER BALLECTOR: Vertical Slice version
description:
DARE TO COLLECT ALL THE BALLS (GET IT? BALLECTOR!) IN THIS 4 LEVEL VERTICAL SLICE, FEATURING:

  • Doors that react to collected balls (again, ballector).
  • Switches that enable and disable obstacles simultaneously.
  • Portals that bring you to other dimensions!!! Not really, just to another part of the level, but smoothly.
  • An end level dance.
  • Multiple skins, even one for the ones waiting for Silksong to come out :)

*Controller is highly recommended for big precision inputs.

**Windows version is preferable as WebGL doesn't compile the outlined shaders created for this game.
